name: Bee/Line
description:
Bee/Line is a puzzle game that's deceptively simple. Just click and drag the hex clusters to fill in the honeycomb on the left. Choose from 15 levels ranging from worker bee (easy) to drone bee (medium) to queen bee (hard). Works best in Google Chrome on desktop.

---------------

Made in 48 hours for Global Game Jam 2019, Richmond, Virginia

Team: Eric Chai (programming), Ruthie Edwards (interface design), Daniel Davis (music & sound), Margaret Karles (level design), Dalton Zheng (art)
